Package org.openlca.core.matrix

Class ProductSystemBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.openlca.core.matrix.ProductSystemBuilder
public class ProductSystemBuilder extends Object
Builds or auto-completes a product system according to a given configuration.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    ProductSystemBuilder​(MatrixCache matrixCache, LinkingConfig config)
    Create a new product system builder.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductSystemBuilder

      public ProductSystemBuilder​(MatrixCache matrixCache, LinkingConfig config)
      Create a new product system builder.

  • Method Details

    • build

      public ProductSystem build​(Process process)
      Creates a new product system for the given process and runs the auto-complete functions with the linking configuration of this build. The returned system is not saved to the database.

    • autoComplete

      public void autoComplete​(ProductSystem system)
      Auto-completes the given product system starting with the reference process of the system and following all product inputs and waste outputs recursively to link them to a provider process. After this function the product system will contain an updated set of process IDs and process links. The meta-data of the product system are not changed. When you then want to save these updated process IDs and process links in the database you can call the #saveLinks(ProductSystem) function.

    • autoComplete

      public void autoComplete​(ProductSystem system, ProcessProduct product)
      Does the same as autoComplete(ProductSystem) but starts the linking at the given process product which can be arbitrary product in the supply chain of the given system.

    • saveUpdates

      public ProductSystem saveUpdates​(ProductSystem system)
      Saves the updated process links and IDs of the given product system in the databases. Note that if the product system is already contained in the database (i.e. has an ID > 0) this function will not update the other meta-data of the system as it is intended to call this function after an autoComplete(ProductSystem) call in this case.
